welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Broughton Astley, a charming village in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque views and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at West Midlands International Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a faster premium option also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
